name: The Underworld (loddisjourney)
description:
Welcome to our game (prototype) "The Underworld" for the MiniJam117!

Coding by Rene & Art by Loddi

This game is not finished and will be updated in the following days. (like sounds and weapon shop and bug fixes ...)

Story:

Professor Lambert proved the existence of the underworld in his experiment. Using a sensor, he was able to measure the undead creatures of the underworld. Now he wants to go there with a portal to collect the essence of ghosts with his modified shotgun to conduct further experiments.

Controls:

Use W to move around while defining the direction with the mouse curser.

Use mouse Left button to shoot while defining the direction with the mouse curser.

Reload the weapon with R.

Interact with F.

(Score by killing the zombies and collecting the ghosts.) online score comes in upcoming release

(Unlock new weapons in the PC room with your score.) comes in upcoming release
